name: Pragma
storyline: In the year 45XX, deep space explorers entered a wormhole. They sent back an unclear transmission describing an artifact of immense power. They were never heard from again. The year is now 55XX. Humanity has spent years training explorers to enter the wormhole and retrieve the artifact. So far none have succeeded. Is it your turn to search for the artifact.
summary: PRAGMA is a fast paced bullet-hell boss-rush game with a minimalist art style.
